newsitem.title: USA: Assets of U.S. money market funds rose in week.
newsitem.headline: Assets of U.S. money market funds rose in week.

text.p: Assets of the nation's 649 retail money market mutual funds rose $14.97 billion to $623.77 billion in the week ended January 8, the Investment Company Institute trade group said Thursday.
It said assets of the 394 taxable money market funds in the retail category rose $9.46 billion to $507.81 billion, while assets of the 255 tax-exempt funds grew $5.51 billion to $115.96 billion.

The trade group said assets of the 316 institutional money market funds rose $19.25 billion to $309.45 billion. Of these, the 253 taxable money market fund assets increased $17.01 billion to $277.91 billion, while assets of the 63 tax-exempt funds rose $2.25 billion to $31.54 billion.
